"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5549636e636872174eb80a00#post_5549636e636872174eb80a00

There's a thing called character development which shows why they have certain motivations

In Lex case for example, he wants to be the savior Superman is and doesn't trust someone who has such powers and isn't even from the same planet
